name: constitutionality
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being allowed by or contained in a constitution: The committee chose to ignore questions of the constitutionality of the Senator's actions.

politics & government (esp. of a law) legality based on agreement with a constitution: The Supreme Court upheld the constitutionality of that law.
